mission.title: Mission
mission.text: To provide development opportunities that empower young people to create positive change.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: To be the leading global network of young active citizens.

values.title: Values
values.text: Our values are: Community, Development, Diversity, Internationalism and Accountability.

joinUs.title: Join Us
joinUs.text: If you want to be part of this great family, do not hesitate to contact us.
